## Header 1

```{r setup}
#| include: false
library(tidyverse)
source(here::here("R/functions.R"))
lipidomics <- read_csv(here::here("data/lipidomics.csv"))
```

## Basic statisticss

```{r}
lipidomics |>
    group_by(metabolite) |> 
    summarize(across(
        value, 
        list(
            mean = mean, 
            sd = sd
            )
    )) |>
    mutate(across( # across: Given these columns (.x is a placeholder for the column), do this action
        where(is.numeric),
        ~ round(.x, digits = 1)
    ))
```
